physical_appearance:This is a photograph of Singapore from the harbour. The foreground of the photograph shows the sea
 with the coast running from the right. In the distance
 there is a bridge
 and several buildings and building structures. On the left of the photograph
 in the distance
 there are some ships and boats near the habour. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Singapore from the harbour. The foreground of the photograph shows the sea, with the coast running from the right. In the distance, there is a bridge, and several buildings and building structures. On the left of the photograph, in the distance, there are some ships and boats near the habour. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
